sectionHeaders.title: 2 Technology 1 Lens-Progressive
sectionHeaders.subtitle: Vision Optimization with Digital Freeform and Variable Geometry
technologies: Digital Freeform: Digital manufacturing for more accurate prescription alignment
Variable Geometry: Places the design within the blank to optimize lens thickness and create better balanced lens aesthetically

sectionHeaders.title: 3 Technology 1 Lens-Progressive
sectionHeaders.subtitle: Enhanced Vision Optimization with Vision First Design
technologies: Digital Freeform: Digital manufacturing for more accurate prescription alignment
Variable Geometry: Places the design within the blank to optimize lens thickness and create better balanced lens aesthetically
Vision First Design: Creates smoother transition and improved binocular balance

sectionHeaders.title: 4 Technology 1 Lens-Progressive XT
sectionHeaders.subtitle: Ultimate Vision Optimization with Dynamic Reading Technology
technologies: Digital Freeform: Digital manufacturing for more accurate prescription alignment
Variable Geometry: Places the design within the blank to optimize lens thickness and create better balanced lens aesthetically
Vision First Design: Creates smoother transition and improved binocular balance
Dynamic Reading Optimization Technology: Correct oblique astigmatism in the reading zones to create a dynamic reading edge

sectionHeaders.title: 6 Technology 1 Lens-Progressive XT
sectionHeaders.subtitle: Ultimate Vision Optimization with Dynamic Reading Technology
technologies: Digital Freeform: Digital manufacturing for more accurate prescription alignment
Variable Geometry: Places the design within the blank to optimize lens thickness and create better balanced lens aesthetically

Dynamic Reading Optimization Technology: Correct oblique astigmatism in the reading zones to create a dynamic reading edge
